meaningMnemonic: Into a <radical>well</radical>, a <radical>drop</radical> of rice falls from your <kanji>rice bowl</kanji>. You were eating out of your rice bowl on the side of a well, and some rice fell out of your rice bowl and this drop of rice proceeded to fall all the way down.
readingMnemonic: Just then, the <reading>don</reading> (どん) of your local mafia shows up, steals your <kanji>rice bowl</kanji>, and shoves you into the well. You’d gotten on the don’s bad side, so he came to teach you a lesson. The don steals your rice bowl and shoves you into the well.
